text: Rasool eman laya uss cheez pe jo uss per Allah Taalaa ki janib say utri aur momin bhi eman laye yeh sab Allah Taalaa aur uss kay farishton per aur uss ki kitabon per aur uss kay rasoolon per eman laye uss kay rasoolon mein say kissi mein hum tafareeq nahi kertay unhon ney keh diya kay hum ney suna aur itaat ki hum teri bakshish talab kertay hain aey humaray rab! Aur humen teri taraf hi lotna hai
